英文法規名稱: Fee-charging Standards for Issuing Approval Documents for Importing and Exporting Rice
中文法規名稱: 稻米出進口同意文件規費收費標準
沿革內容: 1.Full text of 5 Articles was promulgated by the Council of Agriculture Order Nung-Liang-Tze No.1111090793 on October 27, 2022, and shall become effective on July 1, 2023.

法規內容.條文內容: These Standards are enacted pursuant to Paragraph 1 of Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.

Exporters and importers applying for an Approval Document for Importing and Exporting Rice, pursuant to the Regulations on Issuing Approval Documents for Importing and Exporting Rice, shall pay fees described as follows, which is also charged when applying for an amendment to the Approval Document:
1. NT$100 for each application.
2. Expedited service, issued within three working days, NT$150 for each application.
There shall be a fee waiver for agencies and schools if they apply for an Approval Document for Importing and Exporting rice just for their operation needs.
If the Approval Document for Importing and Exporting Rice is not issued, the applicant should be refunded (interest-free) the paid fee.
These Standards shall take effect on July 1, 2023.
